<h1>Biography</h1>

<p>Welcome to my research and illustration portfolio!</p>

<p>I am currently a CNRS postdoctoral researcher at the <a href="https://www.locean.ipsl.fr/" target="_blank">LOCEAN</a> laboratory in Paris, working on the spatial distribution and diversity of zooplankton and phytoplankton using quantitative imaging and machine learning techniques.</p>

<p>My research integrates environmental and biological data to investigate spatial distribution of zooplankton and phytoplankton as well as their role in the biological carbon pump.</p>
